Shockwave:



Shockwave's internal repairs were done.  The damage he had sustained in his 
jet mode was gone.  Going on his long range scanners, he picked up someone.  
Though in what would later be called Seoul, South Korea, his scanners did 
pick up something.  A small energy source.  It was a craft, he knew that.  
Just analyzing the weak signature didn't tell him how large.  For all he knew 
it could be the size of a huge continet and just had worn down over the 
millenia, or as big as his fist.  Transforming to space fighter mode 
wordlessly, he launched himself off into the air.  Heading for what would be 
known as Australia, not knowing he would find Amobeous and Bacterium's ship.
